title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 1630 - Insurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 1630 - Insurance

State Regulations

Subpart 1630-1 - General Regulations (§ 1630-1.1 to 1630-1.8)

Subpart 1630-2 - Preconstruction Period (§ 1630-2.1 to 1630-2.2)

Subpart 1630-3 - Construction Period (§ 1630-3.1 to 1630-3.2)

Subpart 1630-4 - Operating Period (§ 1630-4.1 to 1630-4.9)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. III, subch. C, pt. 1630

Statutory authority: Public Housing Law, §§14, 19

This Part outlines the insurance requirements of the

State Division of Housing with respect to projects constructed under loan and
subsidy contracts made with various authorities. These instructions are an
amplification of the requirements set forth in general terms in the loan
contract. The authority is responsible for having State-aided projects
adequately covered at all times by necessary insurance and bonds from execution
date of loan and subsidy contract throughout life of contract, in accordance
with the regulations set forth herein. This Part has been divided into four

Subparts covering general regulations, the preconstruction, the construction
and the operating periods of State-aided
projects. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
